Please try again later OK Some Error Occurred! // Please enter an email address Please enter name Preemadonna is a technology company building smart products, powering creative platform and inspiring self expression.

The Nailbot, our first nail art printing robot, automatically decorates nails instantly with a smartphone! Through our platforms and marketplace, Preemadonnas can express themselves in creative and original ways.

Preemadonnas are DYNAMIC!
We are inventors, artists, makers, engineers, designers, athletes, teachers, leaders, storytellers, hackers and showstoppers
We come from all over the world in all shapes, sizes, ages and races. We are creators of technology - not just consumers.

We believe that being smart and feeling beautiful are not a contradiction. Our community is learning about the technology behind the Nailbot through our STE(A)M curriculum, Ambassador Programs & Partnerships with schools, Tech camps and Non-profits. We are smart. We are beautiful. We invent the future. About us About Legal FAQ Account
